alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 3:25PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LANCASTER COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 324 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Petersburg, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Ephrata, Columbia, Lititz, Millersville, Willow Street, Mount Joy, New Holland, Manheim, East Petersburg, Akron, Leola, Paradise, Salunga-Landisville, Reamstown, Rothsville, Strasburg, Mountville, Wrightsville and Leacock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
